item.title: Biography
item.description: I am Kai Yue, a Ph.D. candidate majored in Electrical Engineering at North Carolina State University. Currently, I am supervised by Prof. Chau-Wai Wong and Prof. Huaiyu Dai, focusing on the cross-disciplinary research of machine learning and communication. Before I join NC State, I graduated with a BEng in Electronic Information Engineering at University of Science and Technology of China.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Education BEng in Software Engineering, 2012 University of Science and Technology of China (USTC) Honor 2020.07 Graduate Merit Award, NSCU 2020.06 Honours Degree Certificate, USTC 2019.01 IYLFS 2019 Competition Third Place 2019.06 UCLA CSST Scholarship 2018.10 China National Scholarship 2018.09 Mr. Tang-Lixinâ€™s Scholarship Experience 2018.07-2019.06 Undergraduate Research Assistant Microsoft MCC Lab, USTC 2019.07-2019.09 Summer Internship Center for Vision, Cognition, Learning, and Autonomy, UCLA
